videos.title: Barry-Roubaix   Killer Gravel Road Race, Barry County, Michigan 2021
Barry Roubaix 62 Mile Gravel Race in 2015 (FULL LENGTH)
videos.description:
Full length video of Barry Roubaix 62 mile race in 2015 from gopro camera.  This was my FIRST bike race ever.  Over the years I've improved and gained fitness.  In 2016 I improved a lot finishing around 20th.  You can see that video here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7FgDS_Uy7Mg

I wrote a detailed blog post that will help other athletes maximize their results.  There are some good hints on how to prepare and race the event. 

https://www.endurancelab.fit/barry-roubaix-gravel-race-overview-and-tips/

If you want to ask me questions about the race head over to the forum and ask there:

https://discuss.endurancelab.fit/c/races-and-events/barry-roubaix

Interesting in how to train smarter and get results?
----------
Website: https://www.endurancelab.fit
Forum: https://discuss.endurancelab.fit
Podcast: https://anchor.fm/theendurancelab
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theendurancelab/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theendurancelab
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/tfriestedt
----------

#barryroubaix #gravelrace
